about_the_game:
In Encore, you will beat 2 game modes, each with a series of minigames that increase in difficulty, and boss battles as the cherry on top.

Overview

Have you ever been tortured with minigames by a god? What about in front of a fictional live audience? If you haven't, now's the perfect time to start! In Encore, you're LITERALLY created on stage by an all-powerful sun god named Saul, whose only intention is to laugh at and mock your failures for entertainment. But, laugh back at him as you persevere through his minigames, and win over his audience. These minigames increase in difficulty over time, and after you've completed all 14, you'll have to face the ominous sun god himself.

Gameplay

STANDARD MODE

- Your traditional gamemode, where you become the star of Encore! Traverse through 14 minigames with occasional checkpoints and defeat Saul the Sun God to end his tormenting!

CRAAAZY MODE (Unlocked after beating Standard)

- Was Standard too easy for you? Do you want a real challenge? Well, in CRAAAZY MODE, you have to beat the WHOLE GAME in one run. Not only that, but Saul is clearly fuming, to the point that every minigame was altered to make it even HARDER!! It's almost like 14 entirely new minigames, with double the difficulty, and double the fun.

Different types of minigame genres include but are not limited to:

- Precision Platforming
- Quick-time events
- Dual-control platforming
- Boss battle
- Bullet hell
- And more!

name: Encore
short_description: Welcome to Encore, the fictional live tv show hosted by Saul the Sun God! It revolves around Saul creating humans to torture with minigames. You'll be playing as that human, congratulations! Sounds fun, right?
